content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Kampong Kapor Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Kampong Kapor Constituency** was a constituency in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It used to exist from 1955 to 1976. ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1955**Seah Peng Chuan[LF](/wiki/Labour_Front)**1959**G. Kandasamy[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**Mahmud Awang[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1968**Lim Cheng Lock[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1970**[Yeo Toon Chia](/wiki/Yeo_Toon_Chia)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1972**[Yeo Toon Chia](/wiki/Yeo_Toon_Chia)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election): Kampong Kapor PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****G. Kandasamy** **6,059** **54.27** [SPA](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)Chia Ban Wei3,63232.53[Citizens' Party (Singapore)](/wiki/Citizens%27_Party_(Singapore))Yen Jen San3302.96[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politician))Jaganathan S7116.37[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politician))Choo Yeok Koon4323.87Majority2,42721.74[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)12,736[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)11,16487.66[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1960s ## Historical maps This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
